0_FIT_STEP.TITLE: Is bettercollected right fit for you?
0_FIT_STEP.DESCRIPTION: We do not want to waste your time on bettercollected if it is not a great fit for you. This short guide will help you and us to figure out.

FORM_BUILDERS.TITLE: Do you use online form builders?
FORM_BUILDERS.DESCRIPTION: Do you use online form builders like Google Form and Typeform for collecting form responses for yourself or your company?

FORM_BRAND.TITLE: Did you ever wish if you could brand your forms better?
FORM_BRAND.DESCRIPTION: Wish you could have customer friendly form URLs and your own custom domain links that reflects your brand instead of default generated URLs.

DATA_RIGHTS.TITLE: Wish you could show by action you  care about users' data rights? GDPR/CCPA etc.
DATA_RIGHTS.DESCRIPTION: Data privacy regulations like GDPR and CCPA provide form responders with rights like right to access and to request data deletion

USER_IS_FIT.TITLE: You are in the right place
USER_IS_FIT.DESCRIPTION_1: You use online forms to collect data from your users and care about branding and users data rights. Better Collected is built exactly for you.
USER_IS_FIT.DESCRIPTION_2: We would be happy to onboard you. Sign up now to become a better data collector.

USER_IS_NOT_FIT.TITLE: This app may not be perfect fit for you.
USER_IS_NOT_FIT.DESCRIPTION_1: This app is built for people who use online forms to collect data from your users and care about branding and users data rights.
USER_IS_NOT_FIT.DESCRIPTION_2: Based on your choices, it seems we're not a great match. However, you're still welcome to try out. Maybe you'll still like it.

REGEX.TITLE: Domain-Based Group Member

MODAL.TITLE: Domain-Based Group Member
MODAL.DESCRIPTION: if you want to create a group for employees in a specific department, you can use a regex pattern such as '*@yourcompany.com' to add all employees with email addresses ending in '@yourcompany.com'.

FEATURES.TITLE: Empower Your Organization with Custom Form Page
FEATURES.DESCRIPTION: Create your custom Form Page to centralize all your forms (bettercollected forms, Google Forms and Typeform). This personalized solution allows you to gather and manage all your forms within a single.

FEATURES.TITLE: We’re a privacy-focused form builder platform
FEATURES.OTP_SUBTITLE: Becoming a customer of bettercollected is a promise to
FEATURES.DESCRIPTION: Unlike other form builders, we put form responders’ privacy rights at the fore front.
FEATURES.OTP_DESCRIPTION: We make sure that the responders can access their form responses and can request deletion of their responses whenever they choose to do so.

HANDLE.DESC: Customize your workspace handle name to make your workspace more personal.
HANDLE.POINT_1: Your new workspace handle name will be displayed in all of your workspace-related communications, such as workspace link, forms etc.
HANDLE.POINT_2: Any links with old workspace handle name will no longer work.

DOMAIN.DESC: Changing your domain name and improve your workspace branding and identity.
DOMAIN.POINT_1: Your new domain name will be displayed in all of your workspace-related communications, such as workspace link, forms etc.
DOMAIN.POINT_2: Any links with old domain name will no longer work.

ACCOUNT_DELETION_CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Are you sure you want to delete Account?
ACCOUNT_DELETION_CONFIRMATION.POINT_1: All your workspace will be deleted.
ACCOUNT_DELETION_CONFIRMATION.POINT_2: All imported forms will be deleted.
ACCOUNT_DELETION_CONFIRMATION.POINT_3: All created groups will be deleted.
ACCOUNT_DELETION_CONFIRMATION.POINT_4: Your workspace link or your custom form link will not work anymore.
ACCOUNT_DELETION_CONFIRMATION.INPUT_TEXT_LABEL: Type CONFIRM and click on Delete Now to complete action

UPGRADE.DEFAULT_SLOGAN: Upgrade To PRO Plan For More Features

WORKSPACE.SLOGAN: Organize Your Users With Multiple Workspace
WORKSPACE.TITLE: Multiple Workspace
WORKSPACE.DESCRIPTION: Pro accounts offer the ability to create multiple workspaces, while Free accounts only allow for one workspace. This means that Pro users can create separate workspaces for different projects, or teams.

COLLABORATOR.TITLE: Collaborate With Others
COLLABORATOR.DESCRIPTION: Pro accounts offer collaboration features, while Basic accounts do not. This means that Pro users can collaborate with others to import forms and manage forms. This can be a great way to get work done faster and more efficiently.

CUSTOM_DOMAIN.SLOGAN: Personalize Your URLs With Custom Domain
CUSTOM_DOMAIN.TITLE: Custom Domain Name
CUSTOM_DOMAIN.DESCRIPTION: Pro accounts offer custom domain support, while Free accounts do not. This means that Pro users can use their own domain name for their Workspace, instead of using the “BetterCollected” domain. This can be a great way to make your business look more professional and to improve your brand recognition.

UNLIMITED_FORMS.SLOGAN: Import Unlimited Forms with PRO Plan
UNLIMITED_FORMS.TITLE: Unlimited Form Import
UNLIMITED_FORMS.DESCRIPTION: Pro accounts offer unlimited form import, while Free accounts are limited to 100 form imports. This can be a great benefit for businesses that need to import large amounts of data from forms.

WORKSPACE.BANNER_EMPTY_MESSAGE: You can drag to adjust the image.
WORKSPACE.LOGO.DESCRIPTION: Make sure your image is less than 100mb

WORKSPACE.WORKSPACE_NAME_INVALID_CHARACTER: Workspace handle must only contain lowercase letters, numbers and underscore

DEFAULT.DESCRIPTION: Effortlessly customize form links and manage their forms effectively.

PIN_FORM.TITLE: Pin Form
PIN_FORM.DESCRIPTION: When you pin a form in bettercollected, the form will be added to the top of the form so that it is the first thing that your audience can see from your form page.

BRANDING.TITLE: bettercolleceted branding
BRANDING.DESCRIPTION: Show Powered by: bettercollected in your form.

FORM_PURPOSE.TITLE: Form Purpose and Data Usage
FORM_PURPOSE.DESCRIPTION: This page is to help you to provide you with a clear understanding of how how your information is handled in our form. Our aim is to ensure you're fully informed and comfortable with how we handle your data.

VISIBILITY.TITLE: Form Visibility
VISIBILITY.DESCRIPTION: Your choice of form visibility directly impacts who can view and access the form within your form page.
VISIBILITY.PRIVATE: Only you can see this form.

GROUPS.TITLE: Only For Certain Groups
GROUPS.GROUPS1: Only members in this group can see this form.

LINKS.DESCRIPTION: Create personalized form links that align with their branding or specific requirements. A link slug is a brief, descriptive part of a URL that identifies web page content.

SLUG.TITLE: Change Slug
SLUG.DESCRIPTION: Give your forms a touch of professionalism and ensure brand consistency by incorporating your custom slug
SLUG.AVOID_USING: Avoid using spaces or special characters. Only “-” and “_” is accepted.

CLOSE_FORM.DESCRIPTION: This action will ensure that no one can access or fill out the form. You can either schedule a closing date or choose to close it immediately.
CLOSE_FORM.AUTOMATICALLY_CLOSE_ON: This form will automatically close on

RESPONSES.DESCRIPTION: Below, you will find a list of responders who have requested the deletion of their submitted responses.
